sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The leader of the Wagner Group, Yevheny Prigozhin, will be transferred to Belarus and will not stand trial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The move is part of a deal brokered by Belarusian President Lukashenko.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Prigozhin and troops who joined him in the uprising will not face prosecution and those who did not will be offered contracts by the Russian Defense Ministry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: After the agreement, Prokhorin announced that his men were only 200 kilometers from Moscow and that he had decided to ask them to return to Ukraine to avoid spilling Russian blood.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: On Saturday morning, Prokhozhin's private army appeared to control military installations in Rostov-on-Don, the headquarters of Russian operations in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian forces can protect Europe from Russians, but for that they will need more weapons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Vladimir Zelensky has stressed that the security of Europe's eastern flank depends only on the Ukrainian defense forces and that specific types of weaponry are necessary immediately. When we address F-16 or ATAKAMS, we develop our common defense.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Real defense is what is needed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Now it is time to give all necessary for the defense of the weapon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Progress by Ukraine's army has been slow over the past two weeks, having liberated eight villages from Russian forces so far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The commander of Kyiv's ground forces said that they are searching for weak spots in enemy defenses which have been difficult to penetrate. He claimed that Kyiv's main force has not yet been engaged in the battle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Thousands of people gathered on Saturday in the center of Belgrade for the Serbia Against

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It was the eighth week of protests in a row in the country's capital and this time it extended to 20 other cities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The demonstrators, including members of some opposition parties, demand the resignation of the president, Alexander Vucic, and also that of top representatives in media, the police force and security services.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They also want an end to reality TV shows and the media that promotes violence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Protests had begun after two massive shootings that happened in Belgrade, in capital of Serbia in May.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This time protesters blocked the national highway which we are standing on.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ana Mihilcic from Belgrade, Serbia for Euronews.
